com.flyingspaniel.xml

Class UsesXPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.xml.UsesXPath
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UsesXPath.HighLoad

    public class UsesXPath
extends Object
    Base class for classes that use XPath to navigate a DOM

    Contains useful utilities for XPath navigation, plus utilities for loading DOMs.

    The base class, UsesXPath, shares a single static DocumentBuilderFactory and XPathFactory for all instances.
    Since neither DocumentBuilderFactory nor XPathFactory are thread safe, their calls,
    loadDOM(File), loadDOM(String) and compile(String), are explicitly synchronized.

    If you are using this class on a high-load application, use UsesXPath.HighLoad instead, where each instance has it's own factory.

    Since:
    Copyright(c) 2013 Morgan Conrad
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the LGPL

        public XPathExpression compile(String xpathString,

        Parameters:
        xpathString -
        nsContext - if non-null overrides any namespaceContext set in @link setNamespaceContext(javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext)
        Returns:
        XPathExpression
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException
